TextLibrary.Text: You must first travel to Siria.
You have survived an attack at the gates of Siria. You must now deliver the message.
The message has been stolen! You must visit your father, Sir Albion, to explain.
As you approach the city of Siria, a thief leaps out at you and demands you hand over the message!
Your father is grateful for your dedication to the task. He gives you a fine Longsword with which to protect yourself.
